email_subject: CNET Cool Gear: Find the right cordless phone
email_body:
Dear readers,

Everybody seems to have a cordless phone at home. But how do you know which models offer the best value? Well now you can turn to CNET. Last week, we launched our reviews of cordless phones. So when the time comes to replace your phone, pay a visit to CNET for some unbiased advice on what to buy.

Read the full story
